query.commandtext: SELECT WORK_DATE, SUM(S1_FAC_IN_LOT+S2_FAC_IN_LOT+S3_FAC_IN_LOT+S4_FAC_IN_LOT) AS FAC_IN_LOT, SUM(S1_FAC_IN_QTY_1+S2_FAC_IN_QTY_1+S3_FAC_IN_QTY_1+S4_FAC_IN_QTY_1) AS FAC_IN_QTY_1, SUM(S1_FAC_IN_QTY_2+S2_FAC_IN_QTY_2+S3_FAC_IN_QTY_2+S4_FAC_IN_QTY_2) AS FAC_IN_QTY_2, SUM(S1_FAC_OUT_LOT+S2_FAC_OUT_LOT+S3_FAC_OUT_LOT+S4_FAC_OUT_LOT) AS FAC_OUT_LOT, SUM(S1_FAC_OUT_QTY_1+S2_FAC_OUT_QTY_1+S3_FAC_OUT_QTY_1+S4_FAC_OUT_QTY_1) AS FAC_OUT_QTY_1, SUM(S1_FAC_OUT_QTY_2+S2_FAC_OUT_QTY_2+S3_FAC_OUT_QTY_2+S4_FAC_OUT_QTY_2) AS FAC_OUT_QTY_2 FROM RSUMFACMOV ??

SELECT WM.OPER, OD.OPER_DESC, SUM(WM.S1_MOVE_LOT+WM.S2_MOVE_LOT+WM.S3_MOVE_LOT+WM.S4_MOVE_LOT) AS OUT_LOT, SUM(WM.S1_MOVE_QTY_1+WM.S2_MOVE_QTY_1+WM.S3_MOVE_QTY_1+WM.S4_MOVE_QTY_1) AS OUT_QTY_1, SUM(WM.S1_MOVE_QTY_2+WM.S2_MOVE_QTY_2+WM.S3_MOVE_QTY_2+WM.S4_MOVE_QTY_2) AS OUT_QTY_2 FROM RSUMWIPMOV WM, MWIPOPRDEF OD ??

SELECT WM.OPER,OD.OPER_DESC, SUM(WM.S1_MOVE_LOT+WM.S2_MOVE_LOT+WM.S3_MOVE_LOT+WM.S4_MOVE_LOT) AS LOT, SUM(WM.S1_MOVE_QTY_1+WM.S2_MOVE_QTY_1+WM.S3_MOVE_QTY_1+WM.S4_MOVE_QTY_1) AS QTY_1, SUM(WM.S1_MOVE_QTY_2+WM.S2_MOVE_QTY_2+WM.S3_MOVE_QTY_2+WM.S4_MOVE_QTY_2) AS QTY_2 FROM RSUMWIPMOV WM, MWIPMATDEF MD, MWIPOPRDEF OD ??

SELECT WM.OPER, OD.OPER_DESC, WM.MAT_ID, WM.MAT_VER, SUM(WM.S1_MOVE_LOT+WM.S2_MOVE_LOT+WM.S3_MOVE_LOT+WM.S4_MOVE_LOT) AS LOT, SUM(WM.S1_MOVE_QTY_1+WM.S2_MOVE_QTY_1+WM.S3_MOVE_QTY_1+WM.S4_MOVE_QTY_1) AS QTY_1, SUM(WM.S1_MOVE_QTY_2+WM.S2_MOVE_QTY_2+WM.S3_MOVE_QTY_2+WM.S4_MOVE_QTY_2) AS QTY_2 FROM RSUMWIPMOV WM, MWIPOPRDEF OD ??

SELECT WM.MAT_ID, WM.MAT_VER, MD.MAT_DESC, WM.OPER, SUM(WM.S1_MOVE_LOT+WM.S2_MOVE_LOT+WM.S3_MOVE_LOT+WM.S4_MOVE_LOT) AS OUT_LOT, SUM(WM.S1_MOVE_QTY_1+WM.S2_MOVE_QTY_1+WM.S3_MOVE_QTY_1+WM.S4_MOVE_QTY_1) AS OUT_QTY_1, SUM(WM.S1_MOVE_QTY_2+WM.S2_MOVE_QTY_2+WM.S3_MOVE_QTY_2+WM.S4_MOVE_QTY_2) AS OUT_QTY_2 FROM RSUMWIPMOV WM, MWIPMATDEF MD ??

SELECT WORK_DATE, SUM(S1_MOVE_LOT+S2_MOVE_LOT+S3_MOVE_LOT+S4_MOVE_LOT) AS OUT_LOT, SUM(S1_MOVE_QTY_1+S2_MOVE_QTY_1+S3_MOVE_QTY_1+S4_MOVE_QTY_1) AS OUT_QTY_1, SUM(S1_MOVE_QTY_2+S2_MOVE_QTY_2+S3_MOVE_QTY_2+S4_MOVE_QTY_2) AS OUT_QTY_2 FROM RSUMWIPMOV ??

SELECT WORK_DATE, SUM(S1_START_LOT+S2_START_LOT+S3_START_LOT+S4_START_LOT) AS START_LOT, SUM(S1_START_QTY_1+S2_START_QTY_1+S3_START_QTY_1+S4_START_QTY_1) AS START_QTY_1, SUM(S1_START_QTY_2+S2_START_QTY_2+S3_START_QTY_2+S4_START_QTY_2) AS START_QTY_2, SUM(S1_END_LOT+S2_END_LOT+S3_END_LOT+S4_END_LOT) AS END_LOT, SUM(S1_END_QTY_1+S2_END_QTY_1+S3_END_QTY_1+S4_END_QTY_1) AS END_QTY_1, SUM(S1_END_QTY_2+S2_END_QTY_2+S3_END_QTY_2+S4_END_QTY_2) AS END_QTY_2 FROM RSUMWIPMOV ??

SELECT WM.WORK_DATE, SUM(WM.S1_START_LOT+WM.S2_START_LOT+WM.S3_START_LOT+WM.S4_START_LOT) AS START_LOT, SUM(WM.S1_START_QTY_1+WM.S2_START_QTY_1+WM.S3_START_QTY_1+WM.S4_START_QTY_1) AS START_QTY_1, SUM(WM.S1_START_QTY_2+WM.S2_START_QTY_2+WM.S3_START_QTY_2+WM.S4_START_QTY_2) AS START_QTY_2, SUM(WM.S1_END_LOT+WM.S2_END_LOT+WM.S3_END_LOT+WM.S4_END_LOT) AS END_LOT, SUM(WM.S1_END_QTY_1+WM.S2_END_QTY_1+WM.S3_END_QTY_1+WM.S4_END_QTY_1) AS END_QTY_1, SUM(WM.S1_END_QTY_2+WM.S2_END_QTY_2+WM.S3_END_QTY_2+WM.S4_END_QTY_2) AS END_QTY_2 FROM RSUMWIPMOV WM, MWIPMATDEF MD ??
